name: t.ex
description: T.EX is a Web extension for Firefox and Chromium-based browsers to enable data collection, inspection, analysis, and visualization to be used in research.

scripts.postinstall: npm run install:labeler-core && npm run install:t.ex-gui && npm run install:t.ex-tension
scripts.prebuild: npm run build:t.ex-gui && npm run build:labeler-core && npm run build:t.ex-tension
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:t.ex-gui" "npm run dev:labeler-core" "npm run dev:t.ex-tension" "npx webpack --watch --config webpack.config.js"
